Gostei muito do jogo e o coop foi uma boa adição se comparado ao primeiro jogo, é bem mais divertido jogar com um amigo do que sozinho, então tenta jogar com alguém para ter a completa experiência do game.
Объективна говоря, игра достойна вашего внимания. Так-как много сюжетных поворотов которых вы не ожидаете, при этом интересные логические задачки над которым вам нужно будет подумать.

Well, I think its fair to say that this was the last decent game made by Valve.

For the pros, there isn't much to say.. it's Portal! It's just really good. Audio, graphics, music, story, controls, the innovative mechanics, and connections for lore in the now unfinished Half-Life universe, it's really good! It at least has a definitive ending for a franchise that never saw one. Not to mention, i've never even found any bugs whatsoever. And this is after replaying the game 4 times now.

And as for the cons.. well, remember when I said I replayed this game 4 times? There was alot of time spanned between these playthroughs. There really isn't much replayability for the base game. But then, the workshop and mods exist.

I'd give it a 9/10. A near-perfect masterpiece.

Portal 2 is everything Portal was and more. With a longer, fleshed-out story, and a full co-op mode, Portal 2 has earned it's place as one of the best games of all time.
I enjoyed the game. The story underlying portal was expanded and made the player feel involved. Puzzles provided a good challenge, and the inclusion of community content is a nice addition.
Bought it in 2019. Still as fun as when i first played it on release. Definitely more worth with the co-op experience.

This game is amazing, it is a little difficult but it is worth replaying for all the secrets and lore, it is an extremly satisfing, you dont even have to play portal one to play it, i got this game first and it was amazing.
Portal 1 but better in every way.

Офигительная игра. Сюжет топ, графон на то время топ, персонажи топ. В этой игре всё прекрасно. Есть кооп на 2 чела за что огромное спасибо, теперь с другом катаем) Головоломки порой попадались очень сложные, отчего приходилось врубать мозги и думать лучше. В общем, кеша, потраченного на игру не жалею, игра стоит своих денег. 10/10
